snippet: The 113th Congress welcomes the largest wave of veterans of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan since those wars began more than a decade ago, but the number of veterans joining Congress continued a four-decade long slide.
abstract: The 113th Congress welcomes the largest wave of veterans of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan since those wars began more than a decade ago, but the number of veterans joining Congress continued a four-decade long slide.

headline.main: A Changing of the Guard Among Veterans in Congress
